2819517503272429727.Text: We've been lucky. We really pushed the Duke and the other Houses when we grabbed Tel Vos. And when he didn't put up  much of a fight to protect the settlement charters, we sent out our losers and lunatics to stake new claims. Some will survive, some won't. But Hlaalu and Redoran have to respond. And in the end, the ones that survive give us more power and influence here on Vvardenfell.
